1.title: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Actor Joseph Gordon-Levitt tackles Kenya's unyielding terrain with Bear Grylls. Dropped into the elements from a helicopter, Joseph and Bear navigate a perilous rappel, milk a camel for needed hydration, and ascend a massive rock dome that tests Joseph's fear of heights like nothing before. As the duo battles a crocodile for the remains of a water buffalo that is their only hope for dinner, Joseph details his rise to fame and his efforts to honor the memory of his beloved brother.

2.title: Keri Russell

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Actress Keri Russell joins Bear on an epic journey to the Canary Islands off the coast of Africa. After battling the dangerous, rolling rocks of a massive volcano, the duo descend into a mysterious canyon where they source a meager dinner of undigested seeds from a pigeon carcass, and test their luck with a grappling hook to escape the towering canyon walls. Later, after a cringe-worthy breakfast of crickets, Keri and Bear make a daring escape from a mountain peak using a paraglider. Along the way, Keri reveals her path to fame, her love of family, and the playful struggles of ...

3.title: Lena Headey

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Actress Lena Headey joins Bear on a 48-hour expedition through the steep cliffs and icy waters of Spain's Iberian Peninsula. Can she handle the punishing conditions?

4.title: Don Cheadle

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Movie star Don Cheadle joins Bear on a 48-hour trek through the unrelenting White Mountains of New England. It's rugged, remote and full of dangerous rivers.

5.title: Derek Hough

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Dancer and choreographer Derek Hough joins Bear on a whirlwind adventure across the mountains of Bulgaria.

6.title: Scott Eastwood

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Bear takes Scott Eastwood climbing treacherous mountains in the Balkans.

7.title: Roger Federer

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Bear and tennis champion Roger Federer hit the slopes the hard way.

8.title: Uzo Aduba

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Dropped amidst snow capped mountains, Uzo and Bear move quickly as a storm sets in, sending hail, lightning and flash floods their way. Along the way they come face to face with a poisonous viper, get creative to secure a dinner of field mice, and use a crossbow to zip line across a 250 ft. drop. Despite the elements, Uzo shines as she recounts her long road to fame, her family's emigration from Nigeria, and her pride in representing the American dream.

1.title: Zac Efron

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: World-renowned survivalist Bear Grylls (Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls (2013) and Man vs. Wild (2006)) leads Zac Efron (Neighbors (2014)) on a non-stop extreme survival journey into the Northeast Appalachian mountain range wilderness. With Bear's help, Zac challenges himself physically, as well as mentally, on an awe-inspiring journey he could never have imagined.

2.title: Ben Stiller

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: World-renowned survivalist Bear Grylls (Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls (2013), Man vs. Wild (2006)) meets actor Ben Stiller (The Secret Life of Walter Mitty (2013)) on the rugged mountains of the Isle of Skye in Northern Scotland, to go on a once in a lifetime adventure. As they explore their surroundings, Bear tests Ben's limits in an effort to see how he measures up to the unpredictable and unforgiving challenges of Mother Nature.

3.title: Channing Tatum

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: World-renowned survivalist Bear Grylls (Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls (2013) and Man vs. Wild (2006)) spends two days with actor Channing Tatum (22 Jump Street (2014)) traveling through the tough terrain of Yosemite National Park in California. As they encounter challenging obstacles, Channing approaches his adventure with the attitude that if Bear can do it, then he can too...or he'll die trying.

4.title: Tom Arnold

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: World-renowned survivalist Bear Grylls (Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls (2013) and Man vs. Wild (2006)) takes Tom Arnold (Sons of Anarchy (2008)) through the unpredictable coastal mountains of Oregon, taking on steep terrain, river crossings and oceanside cliffs. Arnold attempts to channel the courage and determination from his weight-loss struggle in order to tackle a journey that takes him to the brink of mental and physical exhaustion.

5.title: Tamron Hall

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: World-renowned survivalist Bear Grylls (Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls (2013) and Man vs. Wild (2006)) spends two days in the remote Utah desert with Tamron Hall (The Today (1952) Show) getting to know the depths of her personal tragedies and triumphs of her life, while challenging her along the way. Hall makes small talk with an unlikely friend in the wild and later struggles when she finds him on her dinner plate.

6.title: Deion Sanders

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Deion Sanders takes his first camping trip in the wild - World-renowned survivalist Bear Grylls (Get Out Alive with Bear Grylls (2013) and Man vs. Wild (2006)) takes NFL Hall of Famer Deion Sanders to the mesas and canyons of Utah for his first-ever camping trip. Even though Sanders is a fish out of water, he takes a huge leap of faith and accepts Bear's challenges.

1.title: Kate Hudson

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: RUNNING WILD WITH BEAR GRYLLS PREMIERES WITH OSCAR NOMINEE KATE HUDSON TACKLING THE SCENIC YET TREACHEROUS DOLOMITE MOUNTAINS OF ITALY - Famed adventurer, writer and television host Bear Grylls is back for a second season of Running Wild with Bear Grylls (2014). In the premiere episode, Bear takes Oscar nominee Kate Hudson (Glee (2009)) on an adventure she will not soon forget. Their 48-hour journey finds them in the midst of the Dolomites, one of the most treacherous mountain ranges in Italy. As they hike toward the Austrian border on snow-covered exposed rock cliffs, they make some historical discoveries and work together to survive ...

2.title: Jesse Tyler Ferguson

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: High above the Italian Alps, Emmy-nominated actor Jesse Tyler Ferguson joins Bear Grylls for a 48-hour adventure of a lifetime. As the two negotiate the Croda Dei Toni, a snowy peak referred to as the "Mountain of Thunders", they will make a 6,000 foot descent along steep sheer cliffs and sharp ridges, build a snow cave for shelter and eventually rappel a frozen waterfall to their extraction point. Along the way, Ferguson shares some personal insight about his sudden rise to fame with Modern Family (2009), his fight for marriage equality and the challenges he faced growing up.

3.title: Kate Winslet

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Kate Winslet and Bear tackle Wales' Snowdonia Mountains, as she discusses her upbringing and career. Later, they set up camp in windy conditions and swim in an icy ocean.

4.title: Ed Helms

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Ed Helms (Vacation (2015)) joins Bear in the mountains of Colorado, where Ed confronts his fear of heights and feasts on an unusual dinner.

5.title: Michelle Rodriguez

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Michelle Rodriguez and Bear head into the Nevada desert, where they free-fall skydive and scale a huge peak. Later, they find a creative way to remain hydrated, as their water supply diminishes.

6.title: James Marsden

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: James Marsden joins Bear in Utah's Rattlesnake Canyon, where they repel down canyon walls and dine on a chuckwalla lizard.

7.title: Michael B. Jordan

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Michael B. Jordan joins Bear in Wales, where they start their journey by dropping in the ocean.

8.title: Drew Brees

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: In the second-season finale, Drew Brees joins Bear for a journey into a jungle in Panama, where they encounter bats in a cave, descend into a remote cavern and wrestle a crocodile.

9.title: President Barack Obama

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: President Barack Obama joins Bear Grylls for a special trek across the Alaskan wilderness, they chat about the fight against climate change, his relationship with his wife and children and balancing time between work and home.

1.title: Nick Jonas

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: In the third season opener, Nick Jonas joins Bear for a snowy mountain adventure in the Sierra Nevada during blizzard conditions. The guys rappel down a sheer cliff, eat a frozen bird and swim across a freezing lake.

2.title: Julianne Hough

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Julianne Hough joins Bear on a trek in Africa, where they encounter a pack of elephants blocking their path. Other challenges include dealing with big cats and a snake; rappelling from a cliff; and navigating waterfalls.

3.title: Courteney Cox

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Courteney Cox joins Bear in Ireland, where they climb jagged peaks, descend sheer cliffs, battle the cold and feast on maggots.

4.title: Shaquille O'Neal

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Shaquille O'Neal joins Bear in the Adirondack Mountains of Update New York, where they deal with dense forest, leeches and steep cliffs.

5.title: Lindsey Vonn

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Lindsey Vonn joins Bear on the French island of Corsica, where they rappel down a rock wall, use a spear gun, swim and dine on sea urchins.

6.title: Mel B

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Mel B (aka "Mel B") joins Bear in Wales, where they navigate cliffs, cross challenging terrain and tackle a huge descent. Included: Mel administers unconventional first aid to Bear, after he gets stung by a jellyfish.

7.title: Marshawn Lynch

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Marshawn Lynch joins Bear on the French island of Corsica, where they chase a wild hog, navigate cliffs and encounter the French Foreign Legion.

8.title: Sterling K. Brown

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Actor Sterling K. Brown (of This Is Us (2016) fame) joins Bear in the high mountains of Colorado, where they battle plummeting temperatures while descending a sheer rock face, track an elusive deer and rappel down a waterfall.

9.title: Red Nose Day with Julia Roberts

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Julia Roberts joins Bear Grylls in Kenya, where they navigate a harsh landscape of desert, canyons and rivers to deliver vaccines to a remote village.

10.title: Vanessa Hudgens

episode of.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: After a breathtaking repel from a helicopter, Bear and Hollywood sweetheart Vanessa Hudgens evade a boulder avalanche, summit a massive dormant volcano, and come face-to-face with a rattlesnake, which makes for a cringe-worthy dinner. Along the way, Vanessa shares insights on her meteoric rise to stardom and draws strength and determination from the memory of her late father.

imdb.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls
plot: 'Bear Grylls' (qv), British adventurer, takes A-list celebrities on wild outdoor adventures, pushing them beyond their comfort zone.::Anonymous
